Membership

The MGA Cyberknights are a student and alumni-led organization formed to further students’ understanding of Cybersecurity concepts and represent MGA in national and international cyber-related competitions. To learn more about the Cyberknights, please refer to the About Us page.

Interested in Joining?

We are always interested in meeting and talking to people who would like to participate in or learn more about Capture the Flag Challenges, Cybersecurity and Information Technology as a whole, or just want to conversate with others with similar interests. To learn more about CTF challenges or Cybersecurity and Information Technology, please refer to the CTF Challenges or The Armory pages respectively.

The easiest way to get in touch with us is through the Cyberknight Discord, but you could always reach out to us via the Contact Us page.


Meetings

Most of the Cyberknight activity happens in the Cyberknight Discord. This is where you will find current information on the Cyberknights including competition dates, meeting times, & general information relating to the Cyberknights. Meetings for the Cyberknights are held on Wednesdays @ 3:00 in the Discord or in room PSC 250.
